column6: SEVEN THE HARD WAY PART 3 With Bruce Banner, Skaar, and Cloak on his side, Wolverine's mysterious plan to finally defeat Romulus seems to be going well...but that was before coming face to face with Kenuichio Harada, the Silver Samurai!
column8: | penciller:Doug Braithwaite | other:Chris Eliopoulos | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold | colorist:Andy Troy | writer:Daniel Way
